page.title: 19GOING TO SKEGNESS
page.content: GOING TO SKEGNESS by NICK RUSSELL EDITED BY NICK HARVEY & RICHARD RANCE. AFTER SCHOOL WE WENT TO RICHARDS HOUSE AND SET OFF FOR SKEGNESS. WE WERE TALKING IN THE CAR.THEN WE WENT TO A FISH & CHIP SHOP.AFTER THAT WE WENT TO THE AMUSMENTS.AT FIRST WE WENT ON THE DOGDEMS.WE WERE BUMPING EVERYONE.RICHARD AND I WERE IN ONE TOGETHER.AFTER A WHILE IT WAS THE END OF THE RIDE.WE WANTED TO GO ON THE PARATROOPER.IT WAS TURNING ROUND AND ROUND AND IT WAS ROCKING IT WAS GOOD FUN.THEN I BOUGHT SOME CANDY FLOSS.THEN WE WENT ON THE DEEPEST AFRICA.AND WE SAW THE ZULU MEN NEXT WE WENT ON THE GHOST TRAIN.AFTER THAT WE WENT ON THE WALTZER.WHEN THE RIDE STOPPED WE WENT ON THE DISCO BOUNCER.RICHARD WAS JUMPING ON ME.LATER THEY TOOK ME HOME AND I SAID THANKYOU AND I WAVED GOODBYE.
